Function Documentation

void cfs_free_nidlist ( struct list_head *  list  ) 

Frees nidrange strutures of list.

For each struct nidrange structure found on list it frees addrrange list attached to it and frees the nidrange itself.

Return values:
none

Determines whether an expression list in an nidrange contains exactly one contiguous address range.

Calls the correct netstrfns for the LND

*nidlist 
Return values:
true if contiguous
false if not contiguous

int cfs_parse_nidlist ( char *  str,
int  len,
struct list_head *  nidlist 
)

Parses nid range list.

Parses with rigorous syntax and overflow checking str into <nidrange> [ ' ' <nidrange> ], compiles str into set of structures and links that structure to nidlist. The resulting list can be used to match a NID againts set of NIDS defined by str.

See also:
cfs_match_nid
Return values:
1 on success
0 otherwise

int cfs_print_nidlist ( char *  buffer,
int  count,
struct list_head *  nidlist 
)

Print a list of nidranges (nidlist) into the specified buffer.

At max count characters can be printed into buffer. Nidranges are separated by a space character.

Return values:
number of characters written
